encPinHashData.description: it depends on userAction value (userAction = SET_PIN -> encPinHashData is required)

secPublicKey.description: it depends on userAction value (userAction is in {VERIFY_PIN, REGISTER_SECRET} -> secPublicKey is required)

property.description:
property is set by the pattern "domain.key"
"domain = ["case", "mepconfig"]
"case.key" = ["name"] 
"mepconfig.key" = value of KEY column stored in DB table CMN_PROPERTY
